content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I appreciate your interest in my apartment. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location and excellent facilities, at first I was thinking around 650 Euros a month. However, as a student with strong moral principles, I'm eager to find an economical solution. Could we perhaps come closer to 550 Euros per month? If not, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm seeking a more affordable agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As your landlord, I am trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Therefore, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 550 Euros per month is too low for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
